home.info: Antelope is a powerful free, open source service for easy data annotation: terminology search; entity linking; and integration with research data management systems.

integration.title: Integration
integration.paragraph0_0: Antelope can be used in various ways. You may:
integration.list0_0_0: Use this website directly for your search
integration.list0_0_1: the antelope search form in your website
integration.paragraph1_0: Copy the code below and place it on your website or web-based software. This will display the Antelope frontend component within your site.
integration.paragraph1_1: You may send search requests to the component from your own site. After your users select entities within the Antelope component, the results are available in your site for further use. For detailled documentation of embedding Antelope see
integration.paragraph2_0: You can use the full functionality of this website via our API. Have a look at the
